AboutPage.description:
I'm a front-end engineer constantly exploring new ways to enhance user experience and create aesthetically pleasing digital interfaces. 

 My passion lies in pushing boundaries and creating truly special digital experiences.

cookieConsent.description: Welcome! We use cookies to ensure proper site functionality. We may also use our own and third-party cookies for analytical and marketing purposes, including tailoring advertising content to your preferences. Using analytical and marketing cookies requires your consent, which you can express by clicking „Accept”. If you want to adjust your consent for us and our partners, click „Manage cookies”. You can withdraw your consent at any time by changing your selected settings.
cookieConsent.title: We respect your privacy!
